scripts.build: cross-env TURBO_DISABLE_KEYCHAIN=1 TURBO_API= turbo run build
scripts.lint: cross-env TURBO_DISABLE_KEYCHAIN=1 TURBO_API= turbo run lint
scripts.format: cross-env TURBO_DISABLE_KEYCHAIN=1 TURBO_API= turbo run format
scripts.format:check: cross-env TURBO_DISABLE_KEYCHAIN=1 TURBO_API= turbo run format:check
scripts.quality:verify: pnpm lint && pnpm format:check && pnpm build && pnpm test:ci
scripts.migrate: cross-env TURBO_DISABLE_KEYCHAIN=1 TURBO_API= turbo run migrate --filter=@b2b-rental/core
scripts.seed: cross-env TURBO_DISABLE_KEYCHAIN=1 TURBO_API= turbo run seed --filter=@b2b-rental/core
